stimulusHtml:
Used with permission.

The creator of the work shown, which is from Neolithic Papua New Guinea, carved the top into an elongated, rounded shape most likely to suggest the
choicesHtml: curved top of a threshing flail whose handle ends in a scepter
head and upper body of an animal, conforming to the shape of a handle
upright posture of a standing human, reflecting the vertical form of a stele
shape of a blossom whose stem forms a palette used for mixing pigments
